snippet.title: Ember Sword - Announcement Teaser Trailer [OFFICIAL]
snippet.description:
Pre-register: https://embersword.com
Ember Sword is an upcoming free-to-play fantasy sandbox MMORPG (browser + PC) by Bright Star Studios.

Ember Sword is a vast MMORPG universe owned by its users.
Whether you're a peaceful forager of goods and rares making a name for yourself or a fierce warrior of no alignment, there is a place for you here - a place where peace and war is chosen by the players themselves. A place built by you.

Read more about the game: https://embersword.com

Join us on Discord! https://discord.gg/embersword
